Title: Relates to the rights of persons with disabilities in public places and places of public accommodation
Summary: Relates to the rights of persons with disabilities in public places and places of public accommodation; provides that guide, hearing and service dogs are allowed to accompany a disabled person in all public places and places of public accommodation.
LawCode: Amd ยง47, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to the rights of persons with disabilities in public places and places of public accommodation
